body_html: We normally just let the formatting be inconsistent within reason. Other more pedantic solutions make it hard for people to submit correct patches. Any automated tool would need to be easily installable and runnable on all of our dev platforms (osx, linux, windows) in an automated way before a commit. Otherwise we are adding a ton of friction when people have to round-trip through the automated build to see if they have followed the 'rules'.
